name: Pilot the Ship
notes: Move the ship up to its speed. Make Pilot checks for difficult maneuvers.

relatedSkills.outcome: Ship moves; failure may result in collision or loss of control

name: Attack Run
notes: Move and fire vehicle weapons in same turn. Move up to ship's speed and make one attack with any forward-arc weapon.

name: Evasive Action
notes: Pilot gains +2 dodge bonus to Reflex Defense until start of next turn. Ship cannot make attacks this round.

relatedSkills.outcome: +2 dodge bonus to ship's Reflex Defense

name: Starship Dodge (Reaction)
notes: As reaction when targeted by attack: Pilot check DC = attack roll. Success: attack misses. Limited uses per encounter.

relatedSkills.outcome: Attack misses if check succeeds

name: Ram
notes: Pilot check opposed by target's Pilot check (or Reflex if unmanned). Success: both vehicles take collision damage based on size and speed.

relatedSkills.outcome: Collision damage to both vehicles

name: Flying Ace Maneuver
notes: Special maneuvers requiring Vehicular Combat feat and high Pilot skill. Includes barrel roll, bootlegger reverse, etc.

relatedSkills.when: trained in Pilot and has Vehicular Combat feat

name: Fire Weapon
notes: Make attack roll with one weapon system. Use ship's attack bonus or your own Pilot skill.

dc.value: d20 + Pilot (or ship's attack bonus) vs target's Reflex

relatedSkills.outcome: Weapon damage on hit

name: Aim (Starship)
notes: Gain +2 bonus on next attack with specific weapon this round. Must fire weapon same round or lose benefit.

relatedSkills.outcome: +2 to next attack roll with aimed weapon

name: Concentrate Fire
notes: Designate target for all gunners. Gunners firing at designated target gain +1 bonus to attack rolls this round.

relatedSkills.outcome: +1 attack bonus for all gunners vs designated target

name: Fire Linked Weapons
notes: Fire multiple weapons of same type as single attack. +1 to attack per additional weapon, combine damage dice.

relatedSkills.outcome: Combined damage from all linked weapons

name: Autofire (Starship)
notes: Area attack covering 2x2 square area. -5 penalty to attack. Each target in area makes Reflex save vs attack result.

relatedSkills.outcome: All targets in area take damage if attack beats their Reflex

name: Jury-Rig (Starship)
notes: Temporary repair to restore function to damaged system. Mechanics DC 20 (trained only). System functions for 1d4 rounds then breaks again.

relatedSkills.outcome: Damaged system functions for 1d4 rounds

name: Repair Damage (Starship)
notes: Mechanics check to restore hull points. DC 15: restore 1d4 HP. DC 20: restore 2d4 HP. DC 25: restore 3d4 HP. Requires tools.

relatedSkills.outcome: Restore 1d4/2d4/3d4 hull points

name: Boost Shields
notes: Divert power to shields. Mechanics DC 20. Success: restore SR equal to 1/4 max SR. Can only be done once per encounter.

relatedSkills.outcome: Restore SR equal to 1/4 maximum SR

name: Divert Power
notes: Redirect power from one system to another. Mechanics DC 15. Can boost weapons (+1 damage die), shields (+SR), or speed (+2 squares).

relatedSkills.outcome: Chosen system receives temporary boost

name: Recharge Shields (Engineer)
notes: Takes 3 consecutive swift actions (1.5 rounds). Mechanics DC 20. Success: restore shields to full SR.

relatedSkills.outcome: Restore shields to maximum SR

name: Regulate Power Systems
notes: Takes 3 swift actions. Mechanics DC 20. Success: move vehicle one step up condition track (max to -1).

relatedSkills.outcome: Improve vehicle condition track by one step

name: Raise/Lower Shields
notes: Activate or deactivate shields as swift action. No skill check required.

name: Recharge Shields (Shields Operator)
notes: Takes 3 consecutive swift actions. Mechanics DC 20. Restore shields to maximum SR.

relatedSkills.outcome: Restore shields to full SR

name: Redirect Shields
notes: Move shield strength to specific arc (forward, aft, port, starboard). Mechanics DC 15. Grants +2 to SR in chosen direction.

relatedSkills.outcome: +2 SR bonus to chosen shield arc

name: Grant Tactical Advantage
notes: Make Persuasion check DC 15. Success: one ally gains +2 competence bonus to attack rolls or skill checks until end of your next turn.

relatedSkills.outcome: Ally gains +2 competence bonus

name: Coordinate Attack
notes: Designate target. All gunners gain +1 to attack rolls vs that target until start of your next turn.

relatedSkills.outcome: All gunners get +1 to attack vs designated target

name: Order Crew
notes: Direct a crew member to take specific action. That crew member gains +2 to their next check this round.

relatedSkills.outcome: Designated crew member gains +2 to next check

name: Inspire Crew
notes: Persuasion check DC 20. Success: all crew members gain +1 morale bonus to all checks for 1 minute.

relatedSkills.outcome: All crew gain +1 morale bonus for 1 minute

name: Sensor Lock
notes: Use Computer check to establish sensor lock on enemy vessel. DC = 10 + target's Stealth modifier. Grants +2 to attack rolls vs locked target.

relatedSkills.outcome: +2 to all attack rolls vs locked target

name: Jam Sensors
notes: Use Computer check opposed by target's Perception. Success: target loses sensor lock and takes -2 to attack rolls vs your ship.

relatedSkills.outcome: Target takes -2 to attacks and loses sensor lock

name: Co-Pilot Assist
notes: Aid Another action for pilot. Pilot check DC 10. Success: pilot gains +2 to next Pilot check this round.

relatedSkills.outcome: Pilot gains +2 to next Pilot check

name: Take the Helm
notes: Assume pilot duties if pilot is incapacitated. Can pilot ship normally starting next round.

name: Emergency Repairs
notes: Attempt quick patch. Mechanics DC 25. Success: restore 1d4 hull points. Can only be attempted once per system per encounter.

relatedSkills.outcome: Restore 1d4 hull points to damaged system

name: Perform Stunt
notes: Spectacular piloting maneuver for tactical advantage or to impress. Pilot check DC varies by stunt difficulty.

relatedSkills.outcome: Varies by stunt; may grant bonus, avoid danger, or demoralize enemies
